TopicTitle: Icons and mimetype for KSP in the KDE desktop environment

Articles.Content:
I cobbled together some config files so that KSP would show a custom icon in KDE apps and the task manager. For non-super user installation, uncompress the file in ~, for super user installation (not that that would generally happen being a steam distributed app) uncompress the file in /usr. I think this might be a nice thing to include in the package, perhaps with an itty-bitty script to put them in place. This might work better as a shar archive, so that a user could just run it from the install dir and have the files copied out to the real world. I don't know where the icon came from, but the text files are my original work and they are free to use for any purpose with no licensing or restrictions.

THE FILE
